features: About Bristles: The PET bristles are gentle on surfaces, making it easy to clean without causing damage. You can use it on a variety of surfaces, including hardwood floors, carpets, and even pet nests.

Confortable Handle: The painted metal handle is sleek and has no burrs, making it comfortable to hold and easy to use. When the handle is shortened, it can be used to clean tables or table tops, while extending the handle allows you to clean the floor. It's perfect for use in a variety of occasions, including housekeeping, office cleaning, and even as a little helper on your working desk.

Durable Bristles: The PET bristles are gentle on surfaces, making it easy to clean without causing damage. You can use it on a variety of surfaces, including hardwood floors, carpets, and even pet nests

About Features: This portable small broom is perfect for those who are always on the go. It's easy to carry with you, so you can clean up messes wherever you are. Whether you're camping, at a picnic, or just out in the yard, this broom is the perfect tool to keep your space clean. It can also be used as a parent-child broom, allowing adults and children to clean together and have fun while doing it. Note that this broom has a certain weight, so it's recommended for children over 2 years old

Parent-Child Fun: This portable small broom is perfect for outdoor activities. It can be used as a parent-child broom, encouraging children's hands-on ability. For any quality issue, contact us within 24 hours for a solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This portable small broom is perfect for those who are always on the go. It's easy to carry with you, so you can clean up messes wherever you are. Whether you're camping, at a picnic, or just out in the yard, this broom is the perfect tool to keep your space clean. It can also be used as a parent-child broom, allowing adults and children to clean together and have fun while doing it. Note that this broom has a certain weight, so it's recommended for children over 2 years old. our Small Broom is a versatile and portable cleaning tool that can be used in a variety of situations. Its adjustable handle, soft bristles, and lightweight design make it the perfect little helper for all your cleaning needs. Small broom-the perfect cleaning little helper for all your indoor and outdoor needs. This lightweight manual angle broom is designed to make cleaning a breeze, with its portable and adjustable handle that can be used in a variety of situations

Accompanying children to sweep the floor through games, train children to practice housework from an early age, not only to help parents to solve problems, but also to cultivate children's hands-on ability. The seemingly simple repetitive actions can exercise the child's muscles, help the child grow up healthily, and let the child start from the side, do their part for the family affairs, and cultivate the child's sense of responsibility. By imitating the actions of adults, children are guided to think about "how to do a good job", and then learn how to solve problems, gain a sense of accomplishment, and enhance self-confidence. In the process of children and their parents doing things together, children participating, and working together to complete things, children will experience the hardships of parents, share their own feelings in life, and enhance parent-child relationships

Thick bristles, not easy to shed Using dense bristles, moderate softness and hardness, sweeping the floor more cleanly Telescopic rod The handle can be stretched, and the handle can be used as a toy broom for children after the handle is shortened. When the handle is extended, it is suitable for cleaning by adults. Very suitable as a parent-child game tool. The tail hook design is convenient for storage and does not take up space. Easy to install Threaded connection port, easy to install; How to install？ Align the broomstick with the rotating mouthTighten clockwise（installation is complete）

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is very nice !!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m Japanese woman. Actually, I have a problem. Because America’s bloom is little long and heavy. I always buy from Japan but expensive transportation costs. But this bloom is good size for me. Not long and not heavy and good quality. If something problem about bloom for Asian people, I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly into my small RV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too Lightweight - Cheap Product
reviews.reviewText: I anxiously awaited my short broom to use in my RV. Sad to report, when it arrived it was bent. so I sent it back. It had a hollow plastic handle, instead of a wooden one, which was bent and broken. There was no way i could use it to sweep up the floor in the RV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and convenient
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Small Broom with an Adjustable Handle for a unique and heartfelt purpose – to keep my mother's grave site clean and well-tended. This small broom has proven to be the perfect tool for this important task, and I'm truly impressed with its performance and versatility.First and foremost, the adjustable handle is a fantastic feature. It allows me to customize the broom's height to my liking, making it comfortable to use and ensuring that I can reach every corner of the grave stone without straining. This thoughtful design ensures that the broom is suitable for various indoor and outdoor cleaning tasks.The bristles of this broom are both effective and durable. They do an excellent job of sweeping away dirt, leaves, and debris from the grave stone, leaving it clean and presentable. The bristles are also sturdy and have held up well to repeated use, which is essential for this particular purpose.I appreciate the portability of this broom. It's lightweight and easy to carry, making it convenient for me to transport it to the cemetery whenever I visit my mother's grave. It's become an essential part of my routine, and I'm grateful for the ease with which I can keep her resting place tidy and respectful.The small size of this broom is perfect for my needs, and it's well-suited for precise cleaning around the grave stone. It's also versatile enough that I can use it for other household cleaning tasks when needed.In summary, the Small Broom with an Adjustable Handle has proven to be an invaluable tool in my efforts to maintain my mother's grave site. Its thoughtful design, adjustable handle, and effective bristles make it a reliable and practical choice for this important task. I'm grateful to have found such a dependable and versatile broom that allows me to pay my respects to my mother in a meaningful way. I highly recommend it to anyone with similar needs or for general cleaning tasks both indoors and outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best broom for a shorter person
reviews.reviewText: Regular sized brooms are a struggle for me to use due to my short height. Selected this broom after checking reviews. It was easy to assemble out of the box and is just the right size for me. I'm very happy with the purchase and would recommend for those who are under 5'4" in height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for small space
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my small travel trailer. Lightweight and stores easily. Telescoping handle is simple and secure.
